#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#define ll int
#define mod 1000000007

using namespace std;
ll dp[201][101][101][3];
ll func(ll b, ll n, ll run, ll cons) {
	if (run >= 100) {
		return 1;
	}
	if (b == 0) {
		return 0;
	}
	if (dp[b][n][run][cons] != -1) {
		return dp[b][n][run][cons];
	}
	ll a1,a2,a3,a4,a5,a6,a7,a8,a9,a10;
	a1 = a2=a3=a4=a5=0;
	a6=a7=a8=a9=a10=0;
//	cout << run << "    " << endl;
	if (n == 0) {
		if (cons == 2) {
			a2 = func(b-1, 0, run+1, 0);
			a3 = func(b-1, 0, run+2, 0);
			a4 = func(b-1, 0, run+4, 0);
			a5 = func(b-1, 0, run+6, 0);
		} else {
			a1 = func(b-1, n, run, cons+1);
			a2 = func(b-1, n, run+1, 0);
			a3 = func(b-1, n, run+2, 0);
			a4 = func(b-1, n, run+4, 0);
			a5 = func(b-1, n, run+6, 0);
		}
	} else {
		if (cons == 2) {
			a2 = func(b-1, n, run+1, 0);
			a3 = func(b-1, n, run+2, 0);
			a4 = func(b-1, n, run+4, 0);
			a5 = func(b-1, n, run+6, 0);
			a6 = func(b, n-1, run, cons);
			a7 = func(b, n-1, run+1, cons);
			a8 = func(b, n-1, run+2, cons);
			a9 = func(b, n-1, run+4, cons);
			a10 = func(b, n-1, run+6, cons);
		} else {
			a1 = func(b-1, n, run, cons+1);
			a2 = func(b-1, n, run+1, 0);
			a3 = func(b-1, n, run+2, 0);
			a4 = func(b-1, n, run+4, 0);
			a5 = func(b-1, n, run+6, 0);
			a6 = func(b, n-1, run, cons);
			a7 = func(b, n-1, run+1, cons);
			a8 = func(b, n-1, run+2, cons);
			a9 = func(b, n-1, run+4, cons);
			a10 = func(b, n-1, run+6, cons);
		}
	}
	dp[b][n][run][cons] = (((((((((a1+a2)%mod+a3)%mod+a4)%mod+a5)%mod+a6)%mod+a7)%mod+a8)%mod+a9)%mod+a10)%mod;
	return dp[b][n][run][cons];
}

int main()
{
	ll t, b, n, run,i,j, k, l;
		for (i = 0; i < 201; i++) {
			for (j= 0; j < 101; j++) {
				for (k = 0; k < 101; k++) {
					for (l = 0; l < 3; l++) {
						dp[i][j][k][l] = -1;
					}
				}
			}
		}
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
		cin >> b >> n;
		if (dp[b][n][0][0] == -1)
			ll nn = func(b, n, 0, 0);
		cout << dp[b][n][0][0] << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
